items.title: Sunshine
items.plot: 50 years into the future, the Sun begins to die, and Earth is dying as a result. A team of astronauts is sent to revive the Sun - but the mission fails. Seven years later, a new team is sent to finish the mission as mankind's last hope.
items.stars: Cillian Murphy, Rose Byrne, Chris Evans, Cliff Curtis
items.companies: DNA Films, Ingenious Film Partners, Moving Picture Company (MPC)

similars.title: 28 Days Later...
similars.plot: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
similars.stars: Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Christopher Eccleston

similars.title: Moon
similars.plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.
similars.stars: Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott

similars.title: Event Horizon
similars.plot: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.
similars.stars: Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan

similars.title: Children of Men
similars.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.
similars.stars: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen, Chiwetel Ejiofor

similars.title: Gattaca
similars.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
similars.stars: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law

similars.title: 28 Weeks Later
similars.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.
similars.stars: Jeremy Renner, Rose Byrne, Robert Carlyle

similars.title: Pandorum
similars.plot: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.
similars.stars: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet

similars.title: Contact
similars.plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
similars.stars: Jodie Foster, Matthew McConaughey, Tom Skerritt

similars.title: Equilibrium
similars.plot: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.
similars.stars: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson

similars.title: Europa Report
similars.plot: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
similars.stars: Sharlto Copley, Michael Nyqvist, Christian Camargo

similars.title: The Tesseract
similars.plot: A psychologist, an Englishman, a bellboy and a wounded female assassin have their fates crossed at a sleazy Bangkok hotel.
similars.stars: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Saskia Reeves, Alexander Rendell

similars.title: Sphere
similars.plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.
similars.stars: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson

items.title: Howl's Moving Castle
items.plot: A love story between an 18-year-old girl named Sophie, cursed by a witch into an old woman's body, and a magician named Howl. Under the curse, Sophie sets out to seek her fortune, which takes her to Howl's strange moving castle. In the castle, Sophie meets Howl's fire demon, named Karishif√¢. Seeing that she is under a curse, the demon makes a deal with Sophie--if she breaks the contract he is under with Howl, then Karushif√¢ will lift the curse that Sophie is under, and she will return to her 18-year-old shape.
items.awards: Top Rated Movies #136 | Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 19 nominations.
items.stars: Chieko Baish√¥, Takuya Kimura, Tatsuya Gash√ªin, Akihiro Miwa
items.companies: Buena Vista Home Entertainment, DENTSU Music And Entertainment, Mitsubishi

similars.title: My Neighbor Totoro
similars.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
similars.stars: Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto

similars.title: Spirited Away
similars.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
similars.stars: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino

similars.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
similars.plot: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.
similars.stars: Kirsten Dunst, Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma

similars.title: Ponyo
similars.plot: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.
similars.stars: Cate Blanchett, Matt Damon, Liam Neeson

similars.title: Castle in the Sky
similars.plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
similars.stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui

similars.title: Up
similars.plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
similars.stars: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger

similars.title: Monsters, Inc.
similars.plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.
similars.directors: Directors: Pete Docter, David Silverman, and 1 more credit ¬ª
similars.stars: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs

similars.plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
similars.stars: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones

similars.title: How to Train Your Dragon
similars.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
similars.stars: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse

similars.title: Finding Nemo
similars.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
similars.stars: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould

similars.title: WALL¬∑E
similars.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
similars.stars: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin

similars.title: The Secret World of Arrietty
similars.plot: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.
similars.stars: Amy Poehler, Mirai Shida, Ry√ªnosuke Kamiki

items.title: Six-String Samurai
items.plot: A mysterious and powerful hero of the classic kind, Buddy is as skilled with his guitar as he is with his samurai sword. Thrown together with a kid whom he saves in a spectacular battle, the two of them must now escape their enemies and reach "Lost Vegas," the rock 'n' roll capital of this future world.
items.stars: Jeffrey Falcon, Justin McGuire, Kim De Angelo, Stephane Gauger
items.genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Music, Sci-Fi
items.companies: HSX Films, Overseas FilmGroup, Palm Pictures
items.keywords: post apocalypse,martial arts,child drives a car,man wears eyeglasses,low budget sci fi movie

similars.plot: A Russian platoon sweeps a village, avoiding two mishaps. At a remote check-post they play cards with bullets as stakes. A village girl pimps her deaf-mute sister for bullets. A shifty enemy sniper keeps strafing, causing a tragedy.
